data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Arima, Trinidad and Tobago.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arima, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Arima.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 7,948 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Arima, Trinidad and Tobago so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Arima, Trinidad and Tobago to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, the believers in the state of Arima, Trinidad and Tobago need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Arima, Trinidad and Tobago find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
